name: Drift Cars Vs Zombies - Kill eXtreme Undead in this Apocalypse Outbreak Racing Simulator Game FREE
name_original: Drift Cars Vs Zombies - Kill eXtreme Undead in this Apocalypse Outbreak Racing Simulator Game FREE
description:
Drifting cars is fun and games until the zombie apocalypse breaks out. Time to even the odds! Choose from one of 3 incredible armored drift cars and start taking out zombies. Don’t crash or you’ll lose armor and eventually get eaten. Do you have what it takes to mow down zombies and save the town?

Features:

- 20 Heart pounding levels
- 4 Different areas, Park, Hospital, City and Graveyard
- 3 Different drift cars to drive
- Unique Bosses for each area.
